member.name: T:Program.Assignment_1.Matching
member.summary: A type for a matching client

member.name: T:Program.Assignment_1.Person
member.summary: A type for register record (corresponding the client)

member.name: M:Program.Assignment_1.getResponse(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{Program.Assignment_1.Person},Program.Assignment_1.Person)
member.summary:
getResponse: Person list -> Person -> Matching list
This function finds all the matches for a client (Person obj) in a register (list of Person obj) Match for a particular client is another client from register with different sex, a deviation in age less than 10 years and at least one common theme of interest.

member.name: M:Program.Assignment_1.mapToMatching(Program.Assignment_1.Person,Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{System.String})
member.summary: Maps a person object to a Matching object (converts)

member.name: M:Program.Assignment_1.findSimilaritiesInThemes(Program.Assignment_1.Person,Program.Assignment_1.Person)
member.summary:
findSimilaritiesInThemes: Person -> Person -> Person * string list
Find all similar themes of two clients and returns a pair (tuple) of: 1) client passed as second parameter 2) a list of similar themes

existsIn: 'a list -> 'a -> bool
Checks if a list contains an item
